title: Morris' Golden - Suggestions for an accompanying italic?
content:
can anyone offer suggestions for an italic to work with ITC Golden, the William Morris typeface digitised by Engelmann, Jorgensen Newton?

thanks

ben

 [‹ Brush Script Font that is Elegant](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110012/http:/typophile.com/node/48704 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hidden swastica en logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110012/http:/typophile.com/node/17629 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bnwvr

comments.content:
Might also make sense to compliment it with Morris’s [Troy](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/morris/p22-morris-troy/).

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Personal Art and Design Portal of Ivan Gulkov  
 [www.ivangdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110012/http:/www.ivangdesign.com/ "www.ivangdesign.com")

Thanks Nick,  
Jenson is perfect. Makes sense of course, since Morris was inspired by Jenson’s books.  
I should have figured that one out myself!  
Thank you very much for your help
